definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Verhofstadt congratulated China on its accession to the WTO.
sentences.chinese: 伏思達祝賀中國加入世貿組織。

sentences.english: Both companies claimed that the WTO's latest ruling bolstered their case.
sentences.chinese: 兩家公司都認爲世貿組織的最新裁定是己方獲勝。

sentences.english: T. O. really serving the broadest interests here?
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有，世貿組織真的是在服務於最廣泛的利益嗎？

sentences.english: How time flies! In a twinkling of an eye it is already 4 years since China acceded to the World Trade Organization ( WTO ).
sentences.chinese: 光陰似箭，轉眼中國加入世貿組織已經整整4年。

sentences.english: Plus, when a final decision arrives, it is not retroactive.
sentences.chinese: 此外，當形成最終決定，世貿組織不具有追溯力。

sentences.english: China has been (a member )in WTO for 4years.
sentences.chinese: 中國加入世貿組織4年了。

sentences.english: The WTO’s dispute-resolution machinery turns slowly.
sentences.chinese: 世貿組織的解決爭端機制運作緩慢。

sentences.english: It could open the door for other aggrieved trading nations to eventually seek legal redress at the World Trade Organization.
sentences.chinese: 世貿組織將向受不公平貿易侵害的國家敞開大門。

sentences.english: Filipino anti-World Trade Organisation (WTO) protester shouts slogans during a rally in Manila December 13, 2005.
sentences.chinese: 菲律賓反世貿組織的抗議者在馬尼拉的遊行中呼口號。

sentences.english: Domestic steel enterprises strongly feel the global competition pressure, which will be definitely strengthened with accession to WTO.
sentences.chinese: 當然，加入世貿組織後，這種壓力的強度將會加大。

sentences.english: The WTO ruled that the loans were prohibited export subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 世貿組織裁定，這類貸款屬違禁出口補貼。

sentences.english: The second reason to support Doha is to bolster the WTO itself.
sentences.chinese: 支持多哈談判的第二個理由，是要支持世貿組織本身。

sentences.english: Non-discrimination rule is the foundation of WTO system.
sentences.chinese: 非歧視性原則是世貿組織體系的基礎。

sentences.english: He expressed support for Cambodia's efforts to join the World Trade Organization and the Asia-Euro meeting.
sentences.chinese: 中國支持柬加入世貿組織和亞歐會議。

sentences.english: First, foreign institutions shrunken demand, the effect of accession to the WTO own.
sentences.chinese: 第一，外資機構需求萎縮，加入世貿組織效應初顯。

sentences.english: The WTO, Intellectual Property, E-Commerce and the Internet ( Elgar Mini Series )
sentences.chinese: 世貿組織，知識產權，電子商務和互聯網。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
